Rulings.Base:
1. This card is activates and resolves during the Damage Step.
2. You can activate multiple copies of "Shien's Scheme" in the same Chain.
3. You cannot activate this card if you have no 'Six Samurai' monsters in your hand.
4. You choose which monsters to Summon when this card resolves.
